name: Internship Protocol Service
description:
I.P.S. — Internship Protocol Service

Although its called “Internship”, you have quite the responsibilities for an “intern”… As if you’ve already been hired… You find yourself running an app that will assign you a position in the company, a position of a so-called “E-mail secretary” who has no rights to viewing any of the E-mails… A strange virus infests the program, protocol system tries to wipe it off itself — success.….?  Who knows?
